query:
ALTER TABLE successionPlans 
ADD COLUMN exitRisk ENUM('baixo', 'medio', 'alto') DEFAULT 'medio' AFTER status,
ADD COLUMN competencyGap TEXT AFTER exitRisk,
ADD COLUMN preparationTime INT AFTER competencyGap,
ADD COLUMN trackingPlan TEXT AFTER preparationTime,
ADD COLUMN nextReviewDate TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER trackingPlan;
